metadata.name: Elon Musk and Twitter
metadata.description:
This is my art Meme: Elon Musk and Twitter.
Unique and fun art from this historic moment.

Billionaire Elon Musk has reached an agreement with Twitter and has just closed a deal worth approximately $44 billion with the social network.

The value per share will be US$ 54.20. Twitter being a private company after nine years of being publicly traded.

“Freedom of expression is the foundation of a functioning democracy, and Twitter is the digital marketplace where issues vital to the future of humanity are debated,” Musk said in a statement.

Twitter shares rose about 6% after the deal was announced.

Animation created in softwares: 3ds Max, ZBrush and rendered with RedShift.
Video: 1080 X 1080.(loop).
